Sentence: Suspicious, Poole and Bowman radio back to Earth; they are told that something is wrong with Hal and are given instructions to shut him (Hal) off
He (Bowman) wonders whether Hal really could have killed Poole

He (Poole) has a long argument with Hal, at the end of which, because Bowman threatens to disconnect him (Bowman), Hal agrees to give him (Hal) manual control over the process of ending the hibernation
Bowman then descends to the ship's innards and disconnects Hal, who he (Hal) realizes has turned murderer
Bowman learns that Hal had begun to feel guilty about keeping the purpose of the mission from him (Bowman) and Poole
